_(Usually a separate doc but often included)_

# UI Visual Style Guide

* Typography (font hierarchy, weights, spacing)
* Color usage and accessibility
* Iconography rules
* Button states and interactions
* Layout and margins (8-point or 4-point grid system)

# HUD Principles

* Noise budget
* Clarity rules
* Animation style (fade, pop, slide)
